title: Farming Scripts
description: Automate planting and harvesting with code

preDialogues.name: Maru
preDialogues.content: Remember those Plant and Harvest buttons? Well, you can trigger them with CODE too!

preDialogues.name: Qubit
preDialogues.content: Wait, so I don't have to click the buttons anymore?

preDialogues.name: Maru
preDialogues.content: Exactly! We have plant() and harvest() functions. Just like move_left(), but for farming!

phases.title: The plant() Function
phases.description: Learn to plant crops with code

preDialogues.name: Maru
preDialogues.content: First, move to a farmland tile. Then call plant() to plant wheat. Simple as that!

preDialogues.name: Maru
preDialogues.content: Try this: move to farmland (like move_right() a couple times), then add plant() on the next line.

preDialogues.name: Qubit
preDialogues.content: So it's just another function call? plant() with the parentheses?

preDialogues.name: Maru
preDialogues.content: Yep! You're getting it. Go ahead and write the code, then run it!

postDialogues.name: Qubit
postDialogues.content: It worked! The wheat is planted!

postDialogues.name: Maru
postDialogues.content: Nice! But now we have to WAIT for it to grow... or do we?

preDialogues.name: Maru
preDialogues.content: Here's the thing - we can tell our code to WAIT! The sleep() function pauses execution for a set time.

preDialogues.name: Qubit
preDialogues.content: Pauses? Like... tells the program to do nothing?

preDialogues.name: Maru
preDialogues.content: Exactly! sleep(3000) means 'wait 3000 milliseconds' - that's 3 seconds. Wheat takes about 10 seconds to grow, so use sleep(11000)!

preDialogues.name: Maru
preDialogues.content:
Try this sequence:

plant()
sleep(11000)

This plants wheat, waits 11 seconds, then continues!

objectives.description: Write code with plant() and sleep()
Write code with plant() and sleep()

postDialogues.name: Qubit
postDialogues.content: So the code just... waits? That's actually useful.

postDialogues.name: Maru
postDialogues.content: Super useful! Now let's harvest what we planted!

preDialogues.name: Maru
preDialogues.content: Last piece of the puzzle: harvest()! After planting and waiting, call harvest() to collect your wheat!

preDialogues.name: Maru
preDialogues.content:
Put it all together:

plant()
sleep(11000)
harvest()

A complete automated farming cycle!

objectives.description: Write code with plant(), sleep(), and harvest()
Write code with plant(), sleep(), and harvest()

postDialogues.name: Qubit
postDialogues.content: It worked! That was completely automated. I didn't touch anything after hitting play!

postDialogues.name: Maru
postDialogues.content: THAT'S the magic of programming! Write it once, let it run. No manual clicking needed! You've mastered the complete farming cycle!

postDialogues.name: Qubit
postDialogues.content: I actually did it! I wrote a full automation script from start to finish. This changes everything!

postDialogues.name: Maru
postDialogues.content: Congratulations! You've completed the farming scripts quest! You're officially a farmer-programmer now!
